Name: Evil Buster
About the game: Dirty and nasty creatures have got out and pose a threat to the entire city. Who will you call? Correctly! An evil hunter who is used to dealing with such scum with his ultra-laser! Evil Buster - TopDown Shooter with incredible dynamics and a complex shooting system, where you dodge bullets and burn opponents with direct point laser strikes, collect laser charges and go further and further, and the levels become more difficult each time. Features of the game: - Dynamic Music - Beautiful Pixel - Art - Many Levels - Complexity
